name: CampusSafety

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

des: Campus Safety exclusively serve campus police chiefs, security directors, IT personnel, emergency managers and executive administrators involved in the public safety and security of major hospitals, schools and universities in the United States.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
